title: [Siren's Wood, Phlox]
description: Mounds of periwinkle and woodland phlox crowd the path, leaving little room to walk without treading upon the plants as the crushed blossoms send fragrance into the forest air.  A row of tiny glaesine globes, each holding a miniature white candle, has been posted alongside the trail to illuminate the way.
Mounds of periwinkle and woodland phlox crowd the path, leaving little room to walk without treading upon the plants as the crushed blossoms send fragrance into the forest air.
